description.value:
Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 47, Advanced Class Guide pg. 39

Your base speed increases by 10 feet.

At 5th level, you receive @Compendium[pf1.feats.VMVAqGze4cs3naya]{Nimble Moves} as a bonus feat.

At 10th level, you receive @Compendium[pf1.feats.B6wEQOUMv2ifm2Nj]{Acrobatic Steps} as a bonus feat. You do not need to meet the prerequisites to receive these feats.

Oracles only: Oracles with the lame oracle curse cannot select this revelation.
